messages.text: Good morning, Shopia. I wanted to check in on the progress of the website redesign. Are we still on track for the initial launch next month?
Great to hear. Will the timeline include testing and quality assurance? I want to ensure everything runs smoothly before the public release.
Absolutely. We’ve allocated two weeks for testing and QA to address any potential issues. This will give us enough time to make adjustments if needed before the official launch date.
That’s reassuring. Can you also confirm if the payment integration will be fully functional by then? It’s a critical feature for us.
Sure, starting on it today. Will update you on the progress. #task154

Sounds good! Will we have a call to discuss the mockups?
